title: My Beautiful Man
overview: Kazunari Hira is in the 3rd grade of high school. He suffers from a stuttering problem and he doesn't have any friends. Without any dreams, his only hobby is to take pictures of daily life around him. On the first day the new semester, he finds himself in an uncomfortable situation. His classmate So Kiyoi happens to save him from the situation. This causes Kazunari Hira to fall in love with So Kiyoi. His classmate is popular and he purses a dream that nobody knows about. By chance, Kazunari Hira learns about So Kiyoi's dream. This becomes a secret between the two of them.
